sentences.sContent: The plant makes alumina -- a derivative of the metal ore bauxite that is used to make aluminum.
sentences.sContent_eng: The plant makes alumina -- a derivative of the metal ore bauxite that is used to make aluminum.
sentences.sCn: 这家工厂生产矾土。 矾土是金属矿石铝土矿的衍生品，用来制造金属铝。

trans.tranOther: a soft substance that  aluminium  is obtained from
